title: How Much Are These Retro Games Worth? - Game Showdown
description:
The cost is correct! Let's guess the prices of some video game merch from a local game store.

Shout out to The Experience Share in Alameda, CA! And thanks to Imran Khan for joining us!

Season 2 Ep. 14

Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $35 off their best-selling frame.
